2095490.name: Nyxia Survivors
2095490.description:
Nyxia has fallen into darkness. This land once harmonious and peaceful is now invaded by evil forces coming from Hell to enslave humanity. Guided by Light and Hope, Heroes are rising to free the world and bring back peace and greatness to Nyxia's lands, but will they be strong enough?!


Play with one of the 12 Heroes, chose between more than 100 unique abilities make your own combination. Defeat thousands of monsters and face Epic bosses with powerful attacks.


Collect almost 200 items and chose the ones corresponding to your playstyle and Hero to make your unique equipment. Upgrade your items to increase their power. Gather monster's souls and use it at the Soul's altar to improve your attributes. Fight, fall, rise again, become stronger.


Defeat evil forces in a captivating campaign where progress is candenced and balanced. Then discover the "Inferno Waves", a challenging game mode with infinite replayability where Mutators affect the player and enemies. The more you progress, the more enemies are stronger and the more Mutators you will have, but better rewards are granted. This is a challenging game mode that will make you think about your build: Hero, items, abilities and more. Theorycrafters will love it!


Explore 7 different environments, all hand crafted and designed for a balanced experienced. Every environment has its own secrets to discover that may make you stronger for the current run or forever. In Nyxia Survivors, you won't stay immobile, you will want to explore and find what every map has to offer, and you will be rewarded for that.


Climb the leaderboard as high as possible in the "Inferno Waves" game mode and show to the world who's the best.
